parameters.name: materialA
parameters.help: First material participating in the contact material.

parameters.name: materialB
parameters.help: Second material participating in the contact material.

public.name: [friction=0.3]
public.inlineHelp: Friction to use in the contact of these two materials.

public.name: [frictionRelaxation=3]
public.inlineHelp: Relaxation of the resulting FrictionEquation that this ContactMaterial generate.

public.name: [frictionStiffness=1e7]
public.inlineHelp: Stiffness of the resulting FrictionEquation that this ContactMaterial generate.

public.name: [relaxation=3]
public.inlineHelp: Relaxation of the resulting ContactEquation that this ContactMaterial generate.

public.name: [restitution=0.0]
public.inlineHelp: Restitution to use in the contact of these two materials.

public.name: [stiffness=1e7]
public.inlineHelp: Stiffness of the resulting ContactEquation that this ContactMaterial generate.

public.name: [surfaceVelocity=0]
public.inlineHelp: Will add surface velocity to this material. If bodyA rests on top if bodyB, and the surface velocity is positive, bodyA will slide to the right.

public.name: materialA
public.inlineHelp: First material participating in the contact material.

public.name: materialB
public.inlineHelp: Second material participating in the contact material.
